tool_description: Experience the Ultimate in Conversational AI and Code Interaction with Meta Llama's Top Chat and Code API.
name: Meta Llama Fast API
title: Meta Llama Fast API

api_list.name: Super Fast Mistral Chat
api_list.description: Super Fast Mistral Chat prompt request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://meta-llama-fast-api.p.rapidapi.com/mistralchat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meta-llama-fast-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
